sentence.Network_en: Everything breakable had been broken and scattered chaotically about the room.
sentence.Network_cn: 房间里能打碎的东西都打碎了，一片狼藉。

sentence.Network_en: The fridge door was open and food was scattered across the floor.
sentence.Network_cn: 冰箱门开着，食物散落在地板上。

sentence.Network_en: She tore the rose apart and scattered the petals over the grave.
sentence.Network_cn: 她掰开玫瑰花，将花瓣撒在坟墓上。

entry.tran: 分散的;七零八落的;疏疏落落的
entry.def: Scattered things are spread over an area in an untidy or irregular way.

example.ex: He picked up the scattered toys...
example.tran: 他收拾好扔得到处都是的玩具。

example.ex: Tomorrow there will be a few scattered showers...
example.tran: 明天局部地区将会有阵雨。

entry.def: If something is scattered with a lot of small things, they are spread all over it.

example.ex: Every surface is scattered with photographs.

means.word_mean: 1. occurring or distributed over widely spaced and irregular intervals in time or space;
3. being distributed here and there without order;

sentences.sentence: "don't forget to pick up the clothes lying strewn all over the floor"
"a confused dream about the end of the world"

auth_sentence.content: But his speech was met with only scattered applause.
auth_sentence.res_content: But his speech was met with only scattered applause.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But his speech was met with only scattered applause.

auth_sentence.content: The family was scattered, along with the jewellery.
auth_sentence.res_content: The family was scattered, along with the jewellery.

auth_sentence.content: He also discovered that his brain trust had scattered.

sentences.en: His land is split up into several widely scattered plots.
sentences.cn: 他的土地被分割成相当分散的几小块。

sentences.en: He lay asleep with his clothes scattered about.
sentences.cn: 他躺着睡了,脱下的衣服四处放着。

sentences.en: Gathering up his scattered papers,he pushed them into his case.
sentences.cn: 他把散乱的文件收拾起来,塞进文件夹里。
